subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Aaron Ross, the Giants’ rookie cornerback, was suspended for the first half by Coach Tom Coughlin for breaking an unspecified team rule. He then intercepted two key passes in the second half.
snippet: Aaron Ross, the Giants’ rookie cornerback, was suspended for the first half by Coach Tom Coughlin for breaking an unspecified team rule. He then intercepted two key passes in the second half.
